info.title: NutriAID
info.description: NutriAid is a web application designed to bridge the gap between underprivileged individuals and volunteers willing to provide food aid.

post.description: This endpoint is used to register a new user.
This endpoint is used to login as a user

get.description: This endpoint is used to refresh the Json Web Access Token for the user, this is done by sending the refresh token in cookie
This endpoint is used to logout the user, this is done by deleting the refresh token in cookie and in MongoDB
This endpoint is used to obtain the information from all users, omitting password and refreshToken

post.description: This endpoint is used for admins to create a new user.

get.description: This endpoint is used to obtain the information from a specific user, omitting password and refreshToken

put.description: This endpoint is used to update the information from a specific user, have to input entire User Object

delete.description: This endpoint is used to delete a specific user. Only admins can delete users.

patch.description: This endpoint is used for users to update their own information, only having to input fields requiore to be updated

get.description: This endpoint is used to obtain ingredients from a user's pantry
This endpoint is to obtain recipes from SpoonacularAPI and automatically insert them into the database
This endpoint is to obtain recipes attached to the user from the Database, obtains userid from JWT
This endpoint is to obtain all Recipes in the database, only admins can access this
This endpoint is to fetch ingredients from a specific recipe, input recipe id

post.description: This endpoint is for users to insert a recipe into the database
This endpoint is for users to insert ingredients required for a specific recipe, identified by recipe id in parameter, userid taken from JWT
This endpoint is for users to post ingredients and get recipes that can be made with those ingredients, takes dietary information and userid from JWT

put.description: This endpoint is for users to update a recipe prexisiting in the database, recipeid taken from parameter, userid taken from JWT
This endpoint is for admins to update any recipe prexisiting in the database, recipeid taken from parameter.

patch.description: This endpoint is for users to update a recipe prexisiting in the database, only keying in fields necessary, recipeid taken from parameter, userid taken from JWT
This endpoint is for admins to update any recipe, only inputting required parameters, recipeid taken from parameter

delete.description: This endpoint is for users to delete a recipe from the database, recipeid taken from parameter, userid taken from JWT
This endpoint is for admins to delete any recipe prexisiting in the database, recipeid taken from parameter.
This endpoint is for admins to delete recipe ingredients prexisiting in the database, recipeid taken from parameter, ingredients is in request body

bearerAuth.name: Authorization
bearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token in the format **Bearer <token>**
